metadata.how_to_trigger: Press the release button (S_IRN_PrisonerGroup6_Lever_4a688d98-cc90-45a7-8140-038004e2f27b)  to release the hostage from the torture bed, which will free them and play the AD.

0.speaker: Flansy Thornwhist
0.text: Please... free the others... I'm too weak...
0.context: NodeContext: pained whisper, she's just been tortured

1.speaker: Flansy Thornwhist
1.text: Got to... move quick... Gods it hurts...
